short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: quickly create an ID9k link to pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides a context menu to quickly create an ID9k link to the current page.

release notes:
1.0.5
Integrated code from DesiredUsername to generate links locally
1.0.4
Fixed options page to work with new security settings
1.0.3
update to version 2 of manifest file

1.0.2
Added option to have a page action icon shown if the user wants it (defaults to off).
context menu on links now gives the option of ID9king the page or the link.

1.0.1
context menu always creates link to the current page even when clicking on links.

1.0.0
Removed action button.
Added context menu
Added basic formatting to options page.

0.1
initial release.
